search.query: | REST /services/data/indexes |search disabled=0 AND isInternal=0 eai:acl.app=coverity |table title |sort title
| metadata type=hosts index=$field2$ | table host | sort host

index=$field2$ host=$field3$ source="*hostmetrics*" family=cpu chart=system.cpu dimension IN (user,system,iowait,idle,softirq) | rex field=_raw "netdata_(?<name>[a-zA-z_]+)_average\{chart=\"(?<chart>[^\"]+)\",family=\"(?<family>[^\"]+)\",dimension=\"(?<dimension>[^\"]+)\"\}\s+(?<value>[^\s]+)\s+(?<timestamp>.*)" | eval metric=name+"_"+dimension | search metric=system_cpu_percentage* | timechart avg(value) span=30s by dimension

index=$field2$ host=$field3$ source="*hostmetrics*" family=ram chart=system.ram | rex field=_raw "netdata_(?<name>[a-zA-z_]+)_average\{chart=\"(?<chart>[^\"]+)\",family=\"(?<family>[^\"]+)\",dimension=\"(?<dimension>[^\"]+)\"\}\s+(?<value>[^\s]+)\s+(?<timestamp>.*)" | search name=system_ram* | timechart avg(value) span=30s by dimension

index=$field2$ host=$field3$ source="*hostmetrics*" family=swap chart=system.swap | rex field=_raw "netdata_(?<name>[a-zA-z_]+)_average\{chart=\"(?<chart>[^\"]+)\",family=\"(?<family>[^\"]+)\",dimension=\"(?<dimension>[^\"]+)\"\}\s+(?<value>[^\s]+)\s+(?<timestamp>.*)" | search name=system_swap_* | timechart avg(value) span=30s by dimension

index=$field2$ host=$field3$ source="*hostmetrics*" family=disk chart=system* | rex field=_raw "netdata_(?<name>[a-zA-z_]+)_average\{chart=\"(?<chart>[^\"]+)\",family=\"(?<family>[^\"]+)\",dimension=\"(?<dimension>[^\"]+)\"\}\s+(?<value>[^\s]+)\s+(?<timestamp>.*)" |eval metric=name+"_"+dimension |search metric=system_io* | timechart avg(value) span=30s by metric

index=$field2$ host=$field3$ source="*hostmetrics*" family=disk chart=system* | rex field=_raw "netdata_(?<name>[a-zA-z_]+)_average\{chart=\"(?<chart>[^\"]+)\",family=\"(?<family>[^\"]+)\",dimension=\"(?<dimension>[^\"]+)\"\}\s+(?<value>[^\s]+)\s+(?<timestamp>.*)" |eval metric=name+"_"+dimension |search metric=system_pgp* | timechart avg(value) span=30s by metric

index=$field2$ host=$field3$ source="*hostmetrics*" family=swap chart=apps.swap | rex field=_raw "netdata_(?<name>[a-zA-z_]+)_average\{chart=\"(?<chart>[^\"]+)\",family=\"(?<family>[^\"]+)\",dimension=\"(?<dimension>[^\"]+)\"\}\s+(?<value>[^\s]+)\s+(?<timestamp>.*)" | timechart avg(value) span=30s by dimension

index=$field2$ host=$field3$ source="*hostmetrics*" family=disk chart=apps* | rex field=_raw "netdata_(?<name>[a-zA-z_]+)_average\{chart=\"(?<chart>[^\"]+)\",family=\"(?<family>[^\"]+)\",dimension=\"(?<dimension>[^\"]+)\"\}\s+(?<value>[^\s]+)\s+(?<timestamp>.*)" |eval metric=name+"_"+dimension |search metric=apps_l*|eval value=if(metric="apps_lwrites_KiB_persec_other",-value,value) | timechart avg(value) span=30s by metric

index=$field2$ host=$field3$ source="*hostmetrics*" family=disk chart=apps* | rex field=_raw "netdata_(?<name>[a-zA-z_]+)_average\{chart=\"(?<chart>[^\"]+)\",family=\"(?<family>[^\"]+)\",dimension=\"(?<dimension>[^\"]+)\"\}\s+(?<value>[^\s]+)\s+(?<timestamp>.*)" |eval metric=name+"_"+dimension |search metric=apps_p*|eval value=if(metric="apps_pwrites_KiB_persec_other",-value,value) | timechart avg(value) span=30s by metric

chart.title: /1a disk i/o KiB per sec average

search.query: index=$field2$ host=$field3$ source="*hostmetrics*" chart=* disk.vg01_* family="/1a" | rex field=_raw "netdata_(?<name>[a-zA-z_]+)_average\{chart=\"(?<chart>[^\"]+)\",family=\"(?<family>[^\"]+)\",dimension=\"(?<dimension>[^\"]+)\"\}\s+(?<value>[^\s]+)\s+(?<timestamp>.*)" | eval metric=name+"_"+dimension | timechart avg(value) span=30s by metric
